scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Mark, identified by his halo and his attribute, the winged lion, seated at a desk and writing. He is dressed in a blue tunic and a red robe, with a halo around his head. Before him is an open book on a lectern, and a scroll. To his left, the winged lion, also with a halo, sits attentively. Behind Saint Mark, a vaulted architectural space is visible, with columns and arched windows. The background suggests an interior setting with a glimpse of a landscape through an opening on the left. The overall scene represents the evangelist Saint Mark in the act of writing his Gospel, accompanied by his symbolic animal.
